flavorText: Does the stone mimic life, or did it once live?

foreignData.text: {1}{W}, {T}: Eine Kreatur Deiner Wahl wird zu einer Verzauberung und verliert alle Fähigkeiten, bis ein Spieler erfolgreich einen Kreaturenzauber spricht.

name: Soul Sculptor
originalText:
o1o
W, oc
T: Target creature becomes an enchantment and loses all abilities until a player successfully casts a creature spell.

rulings.text: The creature stops being a creature (or any other permanent type) and is just an enchantment with no abilities.
A “creature spell” is any spell with the type Creature, even if it has other types such as Artifact or Enchantment. Older cards of type Summon are also Creature spells.

text: {1}{W}, {T}: Target creature becomes an enchantment and loses all abilities until a player casts a creature spell.
